title: Austin Dillon's Peanut Butter Cheerios Bars

instructions.1: Line an 8x8-inch pan with aluminum foil.
instructions.2: Melt peanut butter in sauce pan and slowly mix in honey. Stir constantly until mixture is completely melted and blended.
instructions.3: Remove from heat and stir in Cheerios. Make sure Cheerios are completely coated in peanut butter/honey mixture. Press Cheerios/peanut butter/honey mixture into the foil-lined pan.
instructions.4: Refrigerate until firm, about 1 hour. Cut bars into desired size.
instructions.5: Store remaining bars in the refrigerator.

questions.question: Is honey from Step 2 still available in Step 5?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 4?
Can we line (Step 1) and refrigerate (Step 4) at the same time?
